title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a project, the bin directory is not checked for scrubbing ability.
EB: When creating a project, the system should confirm that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
1. Open the project creation page.
2. Enter the required details.
3. Click on the 'Create' button.
4. Verify that the system confirms the ability to scrub the bin directory.
